title: La Boheme
brief_description: The Australian Opera Company presents another outstanding production of Puccini’s famous opera “La Boheme” which was recorded in 1988 and features the voices of Glenys Fowles, Neil Rosenshein, Rosamund Illing and John Fulford. The Elizabethan Philharmonic Orchestra, conducted by Carlo Felice Cillario performs the music for the company. An Emmy Award winning production.
